original_title: UFC Fight Night 206: Holm vs. Vieira
overview: UFC Fight Night 206: Holm vs. Vieira was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on May 21, 2022, at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States. A bantamweight bout between former UFC Women's Bantamweight Champion Holly Holm and Ketlen Vieira headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 206: Holm vs. Vieira
